cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-DBUILD_LIBS_ONLY=1;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fpermissive;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-fpermissive;-DCMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY=;-DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=ON;-DKEYSTONE_BUILD_STATIC_RUNTIME=OFF;-DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD=AArch64 ARM Mips PowerPC Sparc SystemZ X86;-GUnix Makefiles;-S;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>;-B;<BINARY_DIR>'
